product_name: Merrell Sweetpea Sandals - Bone - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A great choice for sunny summer days, the Merrell Sweetpea Sandals in bone color look and feel fresh, and offer great support for all-day adventures on your feet. Nubuck leather and nylon webbing uppers have breathable mesh linings that feel great next to skin. Molded nylon arch shanks support your feet during long days; air cushions in the heels absorb shock and add stability. You'll love the feel of the soft, cushy microfiber-wrapped footbeds. Mesh linings and microfiber-wrapped footbeds are treated with Aegis(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial solution to help prevent odors from forming. Sticky rubber soles provide good grip. Closeout.
short_description: A great choice for sunny summer days, the Merrell Sweetpea Sandals in bone color look and feel fresh, and offer great support for all-day adventures on your feet.
